resources.string: Welcome to your products , Happy Browsing ✋
Please Wait Until Loading Words From The Website
* Sorry , but there are no any words to display in general .

* You can change the Url of website by go to 
 1- buildSrc 
 2- ApplicationConfigration Class 
 3- Change on BaseUrl Variable .
* Sorry , but there is an Error happened .
* Maybe it is the network , Pleace check your Connection and if it not work please try again later .
* There is no any word found .
* Please delete the word and search with another word to test the search function, or you can add a new word if you have not added any.
*- Invalid User-Name , You Should enter a User-Name with Minimum 6 characters for it and maximum 16 Character .
*- Invalid Password , You Should enter a Password with Minimum 1 characters for it .
